description: Two European climbers set off this week in an attempt to scale the winter summit of K2.
title: K2: 'Savage Mountain' beckons for unprecedented winter climb
title_page: K2: 'Savage Mountain' beckons for unprecedented winter climb - BBC News
maintext: So unforgiving are the conditions on K2, part of the Karakoram Range that straddles the Pakistan-China border, that it has long been referred to as The Savage Mountain. It was a name that stuck after US mountaineer George Bell said of his own attempt in 1953: "It is a savage mountain that tries to kill you."
